descriptions:
🌲🐿️ Introducing Our Charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box – A Cozy Retreat for Your Furry Friends! 🐿️🌲

Give your neighborhood squirrels a place to call home with this beautifully crafted cedar wood squirrel house/nesting box. Designed with both durability and aesthetics in mind, it's the perfect addition to any outdoor space.

🎨 Unique Artistic Touch: Each box features an exquisitely burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac, making it not just a nesting spot but also a piece of art for your garden.

🛠️ Sturdy and Weather-Resistant: Constructed with care, each house is glued and nailed to ensure it stands up to the elements. Cedar wood is naturally resistant to rot and insects, making it the ideal material for your outdoor wildlife sanctuary.

🧼 Easy to Clean: With a removable roof, keeping the nesting box in tip-top condition is a breeze. This thoughtful feature ensures that you can easily access the interior for cleaning and maintenance.

🔩 Hassle-Free Installation: Your squirrel house comes with all the necessary hardware – two screws and washers – for quick and secure mounting. Get ready to enjoy furry visitors in no time!

📏 Perfectly Sized: With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches, it's spacious enough to be inviting, yet cozy enough for squirrels to feel safe. The interior space is 5.75x9 inches, offering ample room for nesting. A 3.5-inch opening allows easy access for squirrels but keeps larger unwanted guests out.

Transform your garden into a wildlife haven with this enchanting cedar wood squirrel house/nesting box. Order now and delight in watching your new squirrel neighbors frolic and play! 🌳🐿️✨

🌲 **Welcome Nature Lovers! Introducing Our Charming Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box!** 🐿️

Are you a wildlife enthusiast looking for the perfect addition to your garden? Look no further! Our beautifully crafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box is not only a safe haven for your furry friends but also an exquisite piece of art that will enhance the natural beauty of your outdoor space.

**Key Features:**

🔸 **Superior Craftsmanship:** Constructed from the finest cedar wood, known for its durability and natural resistance to the elements, our squirrel house is both glued and nailed, ensuring a sturdy and long-lasting abode for your bushy-tailed buddies.

🔸 **Aesthetically Pleasing:** Admire the intricate, burned image of a playful squirrel on the wall of the box, masterfully created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This unique feature adds a rustic charm and is sure to attract both squirrels and compliments from your guests.

🔸 **Easy Maintenance:** With a removable roof, cleaning and refilling the nesting box becomes a breeze, ensuring a hygienic environment for the squirrels to thrive in.

🔸 **Convenient Installation:** We've included two screws and washers for mounting, making it easy to secure your squirrel house to a tree, fence, or post. Plus, with pre-drilled holes, you'll have it up and ready in no time!

🔸 **Perfectly Sized:** With outside dimensions measuring 12x11x10 inches, it's spacious enough for squirrels to move in comfortably. The inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches and a squirrel opening of 3.5 inches ensure easy access for the squirrels while keeping predators out.

🌳 Create a wildlife sanctuary in your own backyard and enjoy the delightful sight of squirrels frolicking and nesting right before your eyes. Our Cedar Wood Squirrel House/Nesting Box is not just a product; it's an invitation to connect with nature and bring life to your garden.

**Order yours today and be the reason the squirrels have a place to call home!** 🏡
